title: Portrait de Huysmans (Portrait of Huysmans)
marks:
Signature, Title and Inscription

LLC below imag LRC, in the print (backwards): [Eug Delatre]; LRC
description: portrait (head and torso) of a seated man with a short pointed beard and close cropped hair, wearing a jacket and vest; man in left section of image, with patterned curtain behind his head; view over man\'s PL shoulder of room with cat in LRC, picture frames on wall, and sculpture, plants and other objects on a table
creditline: Gift of funds from the Ronald F. Kinney Foundation
